content: **not a pattern but a lifestyle** *wherein i provide you with a guided tour to taking your knitting into your own hands and knitting socks that always fit * the no-swatch guide is for a toe-up sock with a no-wrap no-muss no-fuss short-row heel use your own handspun if you prefer 17 may 2009 pdf was updated to include a link to a web page of videos 1 used in this guide 24 february 2012 - updated the reference to my web site corrected the link to judy gibson s sock pattern as noted below *also included in this pattern * a link to a toe-up sock pattern with a standard gusset and heel flap using the judy gibson you re putting me on sock pattern modified for two-circular needles or magic loop you *can* have it both ways 1 http //pulsh blogspot com/2009/05/lifestyle-socks-videos html
